page.title: 07CARDINAL ALLEN SCHOOL,F/WOOD
page.content: The school was built in 1963.It was originally for{400 pupils}between 11 and 16.In 1975,a new building was added and the total number now is 795.There are 43 teachers and the headteacher, Mr John O'Brien. The school is a Catholic School with pupils also coming from the Wyre District. The school insists on a uniform. The school colours are cherry red, royal blue and gold. Over the past year,the school is proud to have won two national competitions,the{Youth Fire Quiz}and the{Kitchen Design.}The fifth year boys won the{Harry Johnston}football cup.Home-to-home exchanges have taken place and a performance of{The Wizard {Of Oz}is a major event this year. Mr O'Brien's hopes for the years ahead are "to grow,prosper and flourish."
